_header: Thou fair flees that art me dear
_description: Time as friend as foe — two couplets translating ‘O quam cara caro rationi consona raro’ which is written to the left of the English in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Þu faire fles þat art me dereNou ar þu fo nou artu
                    fereWan I þe fede as king of londI lese my time I ere þe
                    sond
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 62.
